We have a limited "storage" offer to fill a bit unused capacity :)

KVM STARTER Storage Promo
KVM based
30GB HDD instead of 5GB 
512MB RAM
2TB Traffic
1 IPv4 (Reverse DNS setable in panel), /112 IPv6 (no reverse DNS support)
Promo code STARTER30GB
[**Direct order link**](https://manage.edis.at/whmcs/cart.php?a=add&pid=10?systpl=portal&language=English&promocode=STARTER30GB)
